title: Rengar nerfs was like

embed.description: I had fun making this video

body:
Even if you don't agree with it.... It's unbelievably hilarious XD
Monsters Inc. <3

P.S. not my video, I don't own shit.. original link where I found it here:
https://www.reddit.com/r/Rengarmains/comments/673ing/how_to_balance_riot/

replies.body: What begins as hysterical laughter soon escalates into hysterical sobbing..

Actually Fiora's new kit is inherently healthier then her previous one, while not saying it is great, it is inherently healthier. She's now actually trash in team-fights. (Don't act as if the ult heal is going to be a game-saver, the chances of that happening are incredibly low) 


Yasuo got quite a few nerfs awhile back and is in a decent spot if I recall.


Don't even know why people complain about syndra, sure her ult hurts like hell, but she's not going to 1shot you if she isn't already snowballing. If she is, it's your problem more then hers.

Fiora & Syndra have extremely projected kits that one can play around, most people just find it easier to do the same thing as always though, but that's your problem. Not theirs.
Fiora shit in teamfights? She kills a tank pretty fast and I don't even want to get started on squishyes.

Lol.


Everything is relative. 
Do you know what old fiora did?

She got a hydra, and ulted. She would hit EVERYONE on your team (if grouped) dealing a shit ton of damage, and hydra procks. Doing approx 1-2.5kish dmg based off your armor stat. This would also give her a full heal. Then her 2 q's would kill 2 people and she had her e for the rest.

Only if she was ahead though... Fiora that had a lead sort of just Q-Q-ult'ed and killed the majority of your team.
But if she was behind... everyone just stands there and laughs as this harmless fly zips around above their heads :/

Not really. The problem was she didn't GET behind. Or very rarely. Her kit was strong more or less due to her W. Her W blocked the next attack & gave AD. IE +15 on level 1 if i recall. It scaled up with the level.

This made laning phase oppressive as well. Fiora as a champion was designed for 1v1s, and to be strong in them. If the Fiora lost lane that as the Fiora's problem. It just wasn't something that was supposed to happen. Her weaknesses was supposed to be teamfights. She couldn't stick onto one person enough with all the utility. However her old kit made up for that in one ability. She was literally considered a female Yi.

Not really here to complain. I'm just saying that you can't just shit about "Golden champions never being nerfed" because they are. People just refuse to acknowledge it.

In low elo yes she didn't get behind, in high elo I wouldn't say so + you overdid it. I have experienced pre-rework Fiora and her ult wasn't all that great if you use it in teamfights, it was good when used on a single target or something, then it did a shitton of damage.

I assure you it was better in teamfights.

It had reduced damage on the same target, and hydra procks were better in a teamfight.

Think about it this way.

Fiora deals as much damage as she can, when she gets low she ults. Dealing about 1-3k dmg based off of armor. This is due to each person getting hit & 5 hydra procks. After this everyone while not necessarily dead would be in a worse for wear state. In this case Fiora is once again full or near it due to lifesteal. Fiora then proceeds to clean up.

>  if she isn't already snowballing. If she is, it's your problem more then hers.

Sooo, all I need is hope she won't pick Snow Day skin :^)

for me in most games if the fiora is my opponent she becomes very problematic for me, if i try to cs with some punishes if she engages. she will just deal true damage to me and parry everything and avoiding her parry attack can be annoying unless im playing Jax, Lee sin or gnar who are easy to dodge anything.

Even when you try to position yourself right to avoid getting true damage stabo by fiora sometimes her dash will hit the true damage point even when she is on the other side.

Her ult is basicly her passive but hit you anywhere and its incredibly annoying to deal with in lane phase or team fights and it heals for way too much so if you have that ignite, or you expect her to hit a trap then just forget about it because her ultimate healing will surpass the trap damage unless your jungler or mid laner comes late to shut her down.

In team fights if her ult marked target dies in the middle of a fight it can cause a massive turnaround.

I don't know what champions you play but she is a big problem for most of my melee bruisers on top lane. If I'm playing top lane twitch, vayne i can deal with her especially with twitch right now who imo is the strongest adc in the game but alot of people really suck at playing him.

Yasuo for most of my champions i can deal with him fine but its the exploits that riot refuses to fix or inform players about and yasuo mains abuse crap like this like the tower ult exploit, i think one of his animation cancel combos did get nerfed but it was a pain to deal with especially if he was fed and you couldn't shut him down for whatever excuse it is. Yasuo has also been popular for far too long and i think over long popular champions should get nerfed out of the high tier meta which will be healthy for the community so players can learn to play new champions or champions that have made a comeback with recent buffs or item builds or reworks.

I also hate yasuo players's mentality they just get super salty if they lose no matter what team they are on and they dont really care about anyone but themselves this is similar to the old days with Riven but at least riven (from what i know of) doesn't have way too many exploitable moves and doesn't block all ranged moves in the game.

Syndra is super easy to play even i suck at mid lane (and i main support) so many times I will just press R even if im a feeder and I will just get a kill of a squishy (obviously the adc) I guess syndra shouldn't be on my list since alot of supports or at least one team member has a skill that can protect an ally but if their defenses are down you can just point n click n press R and destroy the enemy's adc with no effort.

Ok. So syndra's kit is VERY VERY countable. There's a delay on all her abilities (In theory) 

Her q has a delay, her w is two cast and hence has a delay, and her e is based off the first two abilities. Her ult actually does have a short duration before it starts that allows you to zhonyas or something of the sort.

Hating yasuo's mentality is a bad mentality in itself. Just because they play yasuo DOES NOT mean they are toxic. I don't care if the majority is, lumping even 1 innocent person makes you just as bad if not worse then the people who you are judging. 

Fiora's kit is designed for 1v1s. Something you can do if there is an inconvenient location for her passive is to walk out of the passive zone, when you re-enter a new location will be decided. This can be done by both the Fiora and the opposing player. In genearl while fiora can hit the back two or opposite two points, it's dis-advantageous. By doing this you forcing the Fiora to do one of two things.

A) Go for it, hence taking more per trade due to lacking a proper escape. 

B) Wait it out, in which case they are losing part of their healing/poking chances

Fiora's ult also isn't really something that should be hurting you a lot. If she's using it on the frontline, she shouldn't be able to get it off due to utility. If she's using it on your backline, your frontline isn't doing it's job. I know in reality there are always things around that, and it never plays out the way you want it, but that is the general way to work around it. As for traps, I'm not quite sure who your referring to.

The "Trap champions" who deal any significant amount of damage with those traps are:
{{champion:74}}
{{champion:17}} 
{{champion:57}} 
{{champion:96}} 
{{champion:35}} 

Of course there are more, but those are the ones that come to mind. With teemo you should not be struggling with Fiora, she's going to get harassed out of the game. 

Heimer same thing

Mao might be difficult to work with against Fiora, but your more valuable in a teamfight.

Kog should do decent

& if your playing Shaco top, god help you.



My point is people over-estmate and state the power of certain champions and it get's annoying. And my overall point was, those champions HAVE been touched. Don't act as if they haven't. Don't act as if Lee hasn't. Everyone mocks a 5 ad change, but image taking a scale, and balancing 2 completely diffrent materials. Now, lets add in hundreds of other scales that all have to be balanced. Now on top of that let's put a weight on top of some of those parts (items & masteries) & those weighs have diffrent effects for each one of the scales. And oh, did I mention every time you try to adjust one scale another scale changes?

The problem with dealing with her passive is that you have to try and shield it away from her direction or waste time leaving her sight then return and hope the mark isn't on the right side for her to burst you down.

I feel like im playing Mario Party when I'm against or playing as Fiora and its not a good thing to have, yeah this makes me take less damage or no damage at all but this also wastes my time in getting cs and puts her at an advantage.

All yasuo mains are toxic all of them have never been nice and I just mute them on my team and i ban them from my draft games even if the are first pick, I do not like his fanbase at all, I will not have him on my team regardless of how good he is. Do not defend yasuo mains, they are cancer to the game no real human being likes them. only the cancerous of people like yasuo. End of story.

As teemo recently fiora has been destroying my recent match ups as teemo. 
No matter how many times i harass her even if i get 2 kills ahead she will destroy me later because ap items have been nerfed hard and tank builds have become more useful than ever even magic penetration doesn't help.

So if im playing as a marksman on top i will counter fiora as twitch or vayne, AD is far better than AP in this meta which makes playing teemo so useless.

Also this could be a country difference but every person on top that is against a teemo in EUW always gets a oracle lens or sweeper or control ward and most players i see try their best to avoid walking out of the minion line. People know where teemo mushrooms are, teemo is another joke champion that is so easy to destroy in lane as anyone and if you lose to teemo in season 7 then... I cannot help you sadly.

As for Syndra R? Only counterable if the right ability and champion is within the area to prevent her from one shotting.

Shaco top is a joke, I don't get why people struggle against him you must be so bad if you can't beat a shaco on top lane.

Kogmaw? All he ever does is tickle me ever since he lost his rework he is another joke champion unless he has janna or lulu.

Maokai is a good pick for the team fights but alot of people dont play him

Yea.

See. Your mindset is more toxic then the supposedly "Toxic" yasuo mindset.

It's just wrong to group.

We're done here.

Yep..

I mean if you say for example, "White males are aggressive"

Then every time you see one you punch them in the face and torment them because of your stereotype, of course they're going to be "aggressive" 

It's quite stupid to be honest.
And even worse, you don't notice all the white males who just shrug off your comments.

^

Human phycology remembers what it doesn't like over what was neutral or enjoyable, but that is no excuse.

It also tries to conform to previously created stereotypes. For example, a single word, such as saying someone was 'warm' or 'cold' can make the same expression change from a friendly smile to an overconfident smirk.

Yea..

Personally (On this account at least) I try to keep a friendly game. I assure you that many times just reaching out to everyone in the game with some friendly chat will assure you a better experience then assuming, oh they have yasuo, vayne, fizz, lee sin, and zed... Dey gonna be toxic!
Simply put, DON'T STAND NEAR HER IF YOUR VITAL IS FACING HER AND YOUR LOW

Fiora and Yasuo aren't broken. People just A. Hate the class. Honestly, how many people champion champions (hehe) like irelia, riven, camile, etc. B. People love to say these two champions take no skill and are totally broken. While you may say that these two champions wreck when ahead, if they get behind, they are trash. Ever heard of the 0/2000000000/0 yasuo?

To be fair {{champion:134}} is in a rather good spot right now...
nerfed because of lcs lul

And he still kills my poor {{champion:22}}  in under 2 seconds :(

Unless protected by {{item:3053}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:201}}  and holy water.
Also does it whilst building {{item:1400}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3065}}  :///////

May the mighty lords of Riots spare the poor lonely ADC´s paired with "mage supports" the evil that is angry kitten and his battle meow. 

The ones with normal supports are on their own though, dirty premades :(
Under 2 seconds? These days if a fight lasts a whole 2 seconds you get reported for afk.
ah you are certainly correct, my bad ,_,

I was expecting Rengar to show up at the end all fine.
omg lol XD
Thank you for sharing this.
I need a link to the pic of the crushed Rengar face
was about to say you found this on rengarmains lol
Just sharing the awesomeness ;)

well who am I supposed to play if I want to oneshot someone with extreme mobility now?

who?
rengar can't even clear his own camps decently, riot.

If you don't believe me, just try doing red to krugs, and tell me how much health you have left with only 1 (or 2) pots.
What did you say about Malzahar?

How exactly did you play Rengar before, armor pen or crit?
Armor pen to me seems similar to before, so i'm curious how it feels to someone who mains Rengar.

Also I honestly think toplane bruiser is way better after the rework.

Both had their times in the light, crit was the most recent before the rework, and was probably half the reason he got reworked XD

Not sure if top lane post rework Rengar trumps pre rework top lane Rengar though, he's just seen up there a a lot more these days because with these nerfs his early jungle is rough going.

Makes sense, the Q got reworked to kill crit and random assassination.
Its the W change from flat resist to %heal that made him a bruiser.

Topside his passive got a pure buff (hes never actually out of combat), Q can be used to poke and double W makes him hell to gank.

Edit: Also he can duo with Ivern and it's bloody hilarious.
Kindred nerfs were like{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I agree on the rengar part but syndra got nerfed not too long ago, and it was a pretty big nerf. Not being able to throw three balls into a fight and stun everyone kinda sucks
I hate Rengar, but that video is fucking awesome.
